subject: Urgent: Unusual Activity Detected on Your Account
body:
Dear Valued Customer,

We have detected unusual activity on your account ending in ***4532. For your security, we have temporarily limited access to your account.

Please verify your identity to restore full access to your account. Your account balance of $12,543.00 remains secure.

Transaction Details:
- Date: January 14, 2024
- Amount: $892.00
- Location: Unknown

If you did not authorize this transaction, please contact us immediately at 1-800-555-0123.

Sincerely,
National Bank Security Team

CONFIDENTIAL: This email is intended for the recipient only.

subject: Appointment Reminder - Dr. Williams
body:
Dear Robert Brown,

This is a reminder of your upcoming appointment:

Provider: Dr. Sarah Williams, MD
Date: January 17, 2024
Time: 2:30 PM
Location: HealthPlus Medical Center, Suite 302

Please arrive 15 minutes early to complete paperwork. Bring your insurance card and photo ID.

If you need to reschedule, please call (555) 123-4567.

This message contains protected health information (PHI) as defined by HIPAA.

subject: Important Tax Notice - Action Required
body:
Dear Taxpayer,

NOTICE: CP2000

Our records indicate a discrepancy in your 2023 tax return (Form 1040).

Reference Number: 123-45-6789-2023
Tax Period: 2023
Amount Due: $1,245.00

You have 30 days to respond to this notice. You may:
1. Agree with the proposed changes
2. Disagree and provide documentation
3. Request additional time

Failure to respond may result in additional penalties and interest.

Internal Revenue Service
Department of the Treasury

subject: Open Enrollment Reminder - Benefits Selection Due
body:
Dear Team Member,

This is a reminder that the open enrollment period for 2024 benefits ends on January 31, 2024.

Available Plans:
- Medical (PPO, HMO, HDHP)
- Dental
- Vision
- Life Insurance
- 401(k) contributions

Please log into the employee portal to make your selections. If no changes are made, your current elections will continue.

For questions, contact HR at hr@techcorp.com.

Human Resources Department
TechCorp Inc.
